ivardefs.name: authoredOn
ivardefs.desc: When the request transitioned to being actionable.

ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: Plan/proposal/order fulfilled by this request.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: An encounter that provides additional context in which this request is made.

ivardefs.name: groupIdentifier
ivardefs.desc: Composite request this is part of.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Identifiers assigned to this order by the orderer or by the receiver.

ivardefs.name: instantiatesCanonical_
ivardefs.desc: The URL pointing to a FHIR-defined protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this DeviceRequest.

ivardefs.name: instantiatesUri_
ivardefs.desc: The URL pointing to an externally maintained protocol, guideline, orderset or other definition that is adhered to in whole or in part by this DeviceRequest.

ivardefs.name: insurance_
ivardefs.desc: Insurance plans, coverage extensions, pre-authorizations and/or pre-determinations that may be required for delivering the requested service.

ivardefs.name: intent
ivardefs.desc: Whether the request is a proposal, plan, an original order or a reflex order.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Details about this request that were not represented at all or sufficiently in one of the attributes provided in a class. These may include for example a comment, an instruction, or a note associated with the statement.

ivardefs.name: parameter_
ivardefs.desc: Specific parameters for the ordered item.  For example, the prism value for lenses.

ivardefs.name: performer
ivardefs.desc: The desired performer for doing the diagnostic testing.

ivardefs.name: performerType
ivardefs.desc: Desired type of performer for doing the diagnostic testing.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: Indicates how quickly the {{title}} should be addressed with respect to other requests.

ivardefs.name: priorRequest_
ivardefs.desc: The request takes the place of the referenced completed or terminated request(s).

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: Reason or justification for the use of this device.

ivardefs.name: reasonReference_
ivardefs.desc: Reason or justification for the use of this device.

ivardefs.name: relevantHistory_
ivardefs.desc: Key events in the history of the request.

ivardefs.name: requester
ivardefs.desc: The individual who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the request.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The patient who will use the device.

ivardefs.name: supportingInfo_
ivardefs.desc: Additional clinical information about the patient that may influence the request fulfilment.  For example, this may include where on the subject's body the device will be used (i.e. the target site).

properties.desc: Represents a request for a patient to employ a medical device. The device may be an implantable device, or an external assistive device, such as a walker.
